website_summaries.verdict: Stretchy, cool, and breathable, this sling’s versatility is a big help to parents with overtaxed lower backs.
pros: Very easy on the back, with enough cloth to shift to front, side, or back carrying positions
cons: Some users have trouble figuring out proper wrap styles
May stretch too much with heavier babies

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about this since the price is so low compared to other wraps but it came yesterday and I am in love. It is wonderful. If you haven't learned how to wrap it I suggest watching YouTube videos since the photo instructions aren't very helpful for something like this. I am so glad I didn't waste money on a Moby when this is the same thing but cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Hauling Large Ginger Cats
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I got this for my cat who loves to snuggle and be carried all the time. It is perfect for him! He is right up on my chest which he likes, and is very secure. I can also use my hands while he is in the sling, which is awesome. I am very pleased. If your baby is particularly cat-like, it might be a nice thing for it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Great options on how to wear it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Great options on how to wear it. Comes with 2 rings for more options then most. It is longer then most. She has several videos on her website that walk you through the different options. The material is slightly thicker then a thick t-shirt material. Has decent give, but doesn't get stretched out. Great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wrap we tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth wrap we tried, and I wish we'd had this from the day we brought our daughter home six weeks ago. She *loves* being in the wrap facing us, immediately falls asleep and takes 1-3 hour naps while I continue to move around the house. The fabric feels the same as some other wrapps we tried, but I like that this is a bit longer (comfortably ties in front for both me and my husband) and has the ring option for when she has more neck strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions unclear
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this particular wrap are very unclear, however you can use youtube for instructions, and you can also look up the name brand of this wrap and find instructions that are similar. I literally still only know how to do the carrier, cannot figure out the ring sling that well. Don't get if you need instructions. other than instructions this has been great, and lighter weight than other carriers.
customer_reviews.author: sarah crouch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little complicated to use at first but after watching YouTube videos on how to use and wear the wrap it’s a piece of cake now!! So convenient to have. I wear this daily with my newborn. Great to wear on shopping trips instead of carrying a huge car seat or stroller!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Material so stretchy but never returns to shape
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has been rather disappointing. The material is so stretchy it’s so loose that even when you tired super tight within 5 to 10 minutes you’re having to readjust and retired because it stretches out so much. Our son is only 16 pounds and this is no longer a working wrap for us. Pretty bummed
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Teen and Tot 💕

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. I got grey
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I got grey, and it's hemmed with a lovely deep purple thread. Fabric is comfy, baby is currently snoozing in the newborn hug hold. I haven't used the rings but I have them. I'm pretty curvy and still have baby weight, so I couldn't wrap the carrier around myself twice, but was able to tie it securely. All in all it seems perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JessJ

customer_reviews.title: Too Long
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was great! It never stretched out like I was worried about (don't want baby to fall out!). The company was great and had great videos to help out with getting it fitted. The only reason I am giving it a knocked down star is it is WAAAAYYY too long. I would like to see some sizes and not one size fits all. I rarely use it because it's obnoxiously got too much fabric left over afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! :)
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something that my 6 week old son would like and be comfortable in and for me to feel safe carrying him around (he loves to be held). I was incredibly surprised and pleased at how comfortable to wear this wrap is and how soft the material is. I felt really safe carrying my son around. I still have to try out more carrying positions but so far, I love it! :) Great price as well compared to the other wraps. I hardly leave product reviews, but this one was worth it:)
customer_reviews.author: M. Goad

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap has been a lifesaver for me! I have a very active 2 year old and also babysit for several families every day. When I was pregnant with my daughter I knew I had to have something to help keep my hands free. Enter Haul'a Baby! I chose this because of its excellent reviews, price, and versatility. It has not disappointed at all. After a few tries learning how to tie it I am now able to have it in place quickly and have my daughter secure and close to me. It's also great for when she's fussy. Hearing my heartbeat and being wrapped up and cozy always calms her down and puts her to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the wrap did not work for us. I wanted it to and I tried but was not able to find a way to wrap my baby that I felt comfortable with. Plus neither of my kids were very interested in using it. I think it is a nice wrap and would work well for others but for us personally it was not a good fit. I suggest giving it a try to see if it works for you!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Very stretchy material
customer_reviews.text: Works great for larger baby. Very stretchy material. Worked great when my son was 3 months or older. I have a different one that works better for a smaller baby because it is not as stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrap. Super easy to use. I baby wear during meals so we can both eat. She falls asleep everytime. Haven't used it for nursing yet. It was missing the rings but when I called they were quick to get them to me. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Oxtoby

customer_reviews.title: Wraps are not my favorite type of carrier so I didn’t want to spend ...
customer_reviews.text: Wraps are not my favorite type of carrier so I didn’t want to spend $35+ for one. Haul’a baby wrap is awesome and seems like literally the same thing as a moby or boba wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Haul'A Baby sling
customer_reviews.text: I love my Haul'A Baby sling. My baby is 6 months old and we have been using the wrap since he was just a few weeks old. I carry him everywhere in the sling and he love it. We use it the most when we have to make a lengthy run to the store as he doesn't like to be in the carseat that long. I plan to use this as long as my baby lets me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love, love it. My husband and I both use it frequently for our newborn. Sturdy and super soft material- a good moderate amount of stretch in it. Is a bit on the long side, which can be difficult for me to wrap since I'm very petite- but once finished wrapping it still looks great and works perfectly for my husband as well, who is 6'1. On a personal note, I also like that it is a small-business purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND EVEN BETTER PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a Boba wrap but returned it because it felt flimsy to me. I was going to give up on baby wearing but I found this for $15 cheaper and thought I might as well give it a try. I'm so happy it did!!! It's thick, durable and feels much more secure then the Boba wrap and for $25 you can't beat that. I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Howe

customer_reviews.title: She lives abroad but she sent me photos of how well the baby fits into the sling and how comfortable she is in it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a present for a friend and never got a chance to test it myself but my friend loves it. She lives abroad but she sent me photos of how well the baby fits into the sling and how comfortable she is in it, and talked at length about how, thanks to this wrap, the mother is able to do all these things she couldn't do before because of how clingy the baby is and how she doesn't like to be put down. So this was definitely one present that I got right!
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product - great value!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a carrier for my newborn and opted for Haul-A-Baby instead of spending 4X the amount on the "name brand" and SO GLAD I DID! Easy to put on once you practice a few times, great material, durable, safe for baby, comfortable, and a great value! Not to mention you are supporting a small business! Would recommend to anyone looking to wear their baby :)
customer_reviews.author: Mommy315

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product two days and I absolutely LOVE it! (infant facing in). Besides the material is super soft, the instructions were easy (watched video though) and my lil man enjoyed being in it. After about 20 minutes he was asleep comfortably. We also have an infantino and Eurgo, both of those he HATES. I would recommend this to any mother. Can't wait to use it in other ways. :)”
customer_reviews.author: Lakia Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this carrier once so far but my son loved it. I have 2 other kinds of carriers but they don't allow for front facing carry and my son is very interested in everything going on around him so this wrap worked well. We will have to try out the other ways to use it but as of now I like this one and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Savera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice soft cotton material, good length of material to solidly wrap baby in. One of the better products out there. Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to learn to use the wrap but once I did I loved it and so did my son. There is plenty of material to use as instructions indicate or you can be creative and use your own way. Regular carriers would leave dent marks on my sons bottom that is no longer a problem with the wrap. The material is great. Keeps him cool in hot weather. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JOAM228

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I dont know why this is my first ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I dont know why this is my first time using one of these and its my 4th child. Its light and feels so comfortable. I would reccommend watching a tutorial before placing the baby in just to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Star B

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I put it on ONCE and the seams popped. Did not feel safe keeping my son in it at all so after a few minutes I took him out of it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4BoysOhMy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite baby carrier! Very comfortable as it has a lot more stretch to it than most others. The stretch makes it easier to use and more comfortable and it is longer so it fits virtually all body types/sizes.
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Baby Wrap.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this baby wrap. I have baby number 5 and I wish this would have existed back when my first 4 were little. I really like the natural hold for my baby (he's 2 and a half months old). My back and shoulders don't hurt or get sore with the Haul'A Baby like they did using the traditional baby carriers. This is the best thing!
customer_reviews.author: Chuchisnooki

customer_reviews.title: Such great quality. I feel like it will last
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality. I feel like it will last. My baby isn’t born yet to try it out but when I do will write a better review. But for now, quality is great. It’s strong and I love how there’s helpful tutorials and videos if you need help.
customer_reviews.author: angela tran

customer_reviews.title: I like that this has the option to also be a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has the option to also be a ring sling. I mostly use it as a wrap. Works great and much better price than competitors. Only downside to this type of product in general I noticed is newborn gets very warm as does mama. Wish fabric breathed a little better.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very large!
customer_reviews.text: First time having one of this, love the material, I hate that my baby keeps coming down a little maybe she’s to heavy for it?but I’m still learning on how to use it. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeysy Velez

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. It is very soft. The length of the fabric is a little daunting but I can get used to it as I learn different ways of wrapping. I love that it is so versatile and can go from a wrap carrier to a ring sling. I disagree with complaints about the plastic rings. Most of the ring slings I have looked at have plastic rings because the metal ones tend to get warped over time and are less durable than the type of plastic rings used for carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Easier to use than you'd think and definitely worth the money spent (: my son absolutely loves it and it gives me the freedom to do house work without setting him down which he thoroughly disagrees with at times. And as an added bonus, I get more out of my walks/hikes in terms of exercise and I can bring him on my favorite trails while I hike whereas a stroller would be more of a hassle than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Secured baby.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use by following directions and YouTube videos. The edge stitching is starting to unravel after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: David Alford

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I've ever bought as a mom. I wish I would have had this with my first son. Reasonable price and amazing quality. Had to look up some videos on YouTube on how to use the rings it comes with but it's incredibly easy to use. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It's a great feeling material which I like and is breathable
customer_reviews.text: I researched and shopped for far too long before I decided on this baby wrap. It's a great feeling material which I like and is breathable, but I don't feel like I can get it tight enough to properly hold my baby (and she is small)...after help from daddy and him trying it himself we've ended up just rolling it back up and storing it away(I'm not much of a returner). I did contact them and they quickly responded w more help but after a few tries I lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I received a baby carrier as a gift with my first child and my baby's face was either squished of in the way of the buckle and the shoulder straps dug into my arms so I never used it again. This is just stretchy cloth and so comfortable and easy to use! I highly reccomend this product for anyone carrying babies!
customer_reviews.author: Keith and Kaytee Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Haul'a Baby. I think I got this when my son was 6 months but with any other children, I'll probably use even sooner. If my son could stay here, he would all day. (and he's 15 months) Once you understand how to wrap (seriously...it's not that hard) then it'll get easier every time. I usually just used the way the picture shows and when he was smaller, he faced inward. When he was older, outward and sometimes sideways if feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wrap
customer_reviews.text: This was too stretchy. The width was not wide enough and the extreme stretch made it difficult to use. The material is also very thick which made me and my child very hot. I tried it with my infant and toddler and neither liked it. It was not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed carrying my baby with this! I strongly recommend to learn about correct usage of it, to avoid causing harm to the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Glory_182

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My 10lb newborn fits perfectly and I’m a plus size mom I can tie it well, haven’t attempted to ring sling it yet but using as a carrier wrap is perfect I’m able to be hands free and take care of my toddler, I’ve been using it everyday to walk him to his classroom with her wrapped, I leave it on like all day no problem
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: Baby wrap
customer_reviews.text: You are going to laugh but I bought this baby wrap for my daughter/son-in-law for them to use for their cat. Their cat loves to be held and carried around. I was told it is very sturdy, comfortable to wear. If/when they do have children I would definitely buy them another one of these baby wrap.
customer_reviews.author: mlouise

customer_reviews.title: Haul'A Baby is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about the Haul' A Baby. The fabric is soft and smooth. It is strong and well made. The shipping was exactly on the date scheduled to arrive. it will be very useful when the baby arrives, I am sure. It would be nice if it came in other colors, but the gray will work well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: 5+ stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby's favorite way to be carried! I wear him around the house in this and he loves it! The fabric has just enough "bounce" and being able to wear him close to my body puts less strain on my back. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Broderick

customer_reviews.title: the sling is more comfortable than any of the other wraps I have tried
customer_reviews.text: the sling is more comfortable than any of the other wraps I have tried. The material is stretchy and breathable so you don't feel like you are going to overheat in it. I like that it came with the rings to be worn in multiple ways rather than having to purchase multiple slings/wraps. Highly encourage others to try this wrap over the others on the market as there is a risk free guarantee as well!
customer_reviews.author: honalee j

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter loves being close to me and this is perfect. There are ways to tie it without using ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves being close to me and this is perfect. There are ways to tie it without using those plastic rings and it's super comfortable. Since we live in the south, the heat is kind of an issue, but she doesn't seem to mind as long as she's close to me or her father.
customer_reviews.author: Moosey

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this wrap, although it is a little heavy and makes my baby hot. My disappointment is with the color. I purchased the gray wrap, but I didn’t realize the hem all over the edges of the wrap is purple. If the wrap is gray, the stitching should be gray.
customer_reviews.author: slf

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the more expensive Moby wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is a lot lighter and half the price of the Moby wrap. And the extra rings will turn it into a nice sling as well. The fabric is stretchy and of great quality. Customer service is also excellent if you have any questions or concerns. Highly recommend as an alternative to the more expensive Moby.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Menegay

customer_reviews.title: Not for hot cities
customer_reviews.text: I don't give it five stars because we weren't able to use it because we live in a hot environment, but I'm sure that it is very useable in cold cities.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of 5 and never jumped on the baby wrap wagon till now. I purchased this item because of the price and the reviews. I am so happy with my with my new wrap. Our daughter is also happy in the wrap. It is a little long so it's hard to put on out and about but once you get it down it's easy. Best baby product I've bought in a while. Definitely worth the price. Happy baby happy parents.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia galvan

customer_reviews.title: Good for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby wrap. I haven't use the rings, just wrapped it around myself. There are only two disadvantages: 1. it'll be hot for a baby to be wrapped in it during hot season. 2. it can be used till 4, 6 months tops cause then the baby becomes heavier and this wrap will strech under baby's weight. Still the product is good for newborns. And wrapping is easy even for the beginners-slingomoms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service hands down
customer_reviews.text: By far the best customer experience I've ever experienced. The co-founder wrote me to see how I liked the product and truly wanted feedback and cared about my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Better than I even expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby wrap, guys. I was honestly a little bit skeptical because it was so inexpensive, but decided to give it a try anyway, and I'm glad I did! It's got just enough stretch and is very comfy for me and my booga.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elise

customer_reviews.title: Lovveee it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is wonderful . The instructions are easy and very in detail ! There are also videos on YouTube you can watch to learn . My little ones loves being wrapped up . I can even wear my 2 year old in it comfortably !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Heard great things about these wraps and was eager to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Heard great things about these wraps and was eager to try it out. Happy I was able to get at least one successful practice wrap with the instructions provided. Will have to look up the instructions on the others, but I'm excited to start using once my baby is born.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for both
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My son loves it too. Used it on a plane recently and it was perfect for my 4mth old. I am able to get things done while carting my son around. Takes pressure off my back too. Had to watch videos for another carrier though. There was no video on their website for the way I wanted to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I like it and enjoy it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It's very helpful and there are many ways to use it, I like it and enjoy it a lot. Only problem is , it would be be better if the rings were bigger, to use for ring sling, otherwise I'm happy in general
customer_reviews.author: Lia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to nurse her while on the go as well
customer_reviews.text: Once I YouTubed enough videos, I’ve figured out how to successful wrap my 6 month old. She’s very comfy and secure in it. Easy to nurse her while on the go as well! My only regret is that I should have gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Apparently we just aren’t wrap people. We prefer a ...
customer_reviews.text: Apparently we just aren’t wrap people. We prefer a carrier. Too much work and too hard to remember HOW to wrap the baby safely
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Amundsen

customer_reviews.title: but am disappointed with the lack of instructions
customer_reviews.text: I was so anxious to receive this wrap, but am disappointed with the lack of instructions. I am new to baby wraps and printed instructions would be helpful. It's difficult to find videos that are helpful for the different ways to use this wrap. I've only tried the wrap that is printed with the product which I believe is the newborn wrap. Baby does not seem to like it, so I am not getting any use from this wrap. The quality of the fabric is nice though. Wish I could find a way to wear it that, makes baby happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Czako

customer_reviews.title: We both love this. It is a nice fabric that works ...
customer_reviews.text: We both love this. It is a nice fabric that works well. We have dogs and this doesn't get hair stuck on it. Its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SAMG

customer_reviews.title: Love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrap. This is great for cooler weather, baby get too hot if it's warm. My son only likes this if he's sleeping otherwise he fusses to get out. Super easy to use, very secure for baby. I am also a full figured mama and it still works. Only downside is baby may get a lap habit. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! 😀😀
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It works just like the expensive brand name baby wraps but doesn't cost as much. I work at a daycare and this will come in handy alot. It's also very comfortable and easy to use. Haul'a Baby's website has tutorial videos for you to watch and so does YouTube. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Romano

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrier and the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the carrier and the color! It is very versatile and the fabric is very comfortable! It is just stretchy enough but not too much so. My 4 month old LOVES being in here! Great value for the product!!
customer_reviews.author: SVS

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice. The fabric looked comfortable
customer_reviews.text: "I got this for my friend. It looked nice. The fabric looked comfortable. I wish it had more instructions or ideas on how to use it. But you can find that online I guess. It looked very long I don't know if that is a good or bad thing. I think for the price it was a great product."
customer_reviews.author: marisela vega flores

customer_reviews.title: "I love this product
customer_reviews.text: "I love this product. I wish I would have bought it sooner. It is a great price and great quality. The videos are very helpful and my son absolutely loves being in the wrap."
customer_reviews.author: madhattersmarch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that it was extra big for a bigger girl extra long great for support as well.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Love my wrap
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. The wrap is a little long but my premiee baby loves being in it I even have my husband using it..
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the other brands were way too expensive and it works just as good! I had a really big baby and he fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Their product is really good! I love it and I am thinking about ...
customer_reviews.text: Their product is really good! I love it and I am thinking about getting another one for a friend of mine! It is very comfortable and I can use it any way I want.
customer_reviews.author: Faby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product with quality fabrics. The website have a lot of useful videos to quickly learn how to use it. The ring sling option is a smart addition that my 3 months old baby enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly and seems to be of good quality. There are numerous ways to use it and it's fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zmeskal

customer_reviews.title: ... wrap so when I first opened it I was super confused but after reading the instructions and working with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever baby wrap so when I first opened it I was super confused but after reading the instructions and working with it for a quick minute, I now love this wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Cassieee M

customer_reviews.title: Great baby wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby wrap. It's a bit long but the baby loves it and it's safe and cozy. Love that I can have hands free to get things done or carry things.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Fits well for all sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly if you reference the you tube videos for step by step instructions. i’m larger in size, and i had no issues making this fit comfortably while still holding the baby snug and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lasch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift to a friend and she loves it! Good quality material. It is breathable and lightweight, and baby looks comfortable in it
customer_reviews.author: onespot

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love taking our daughter out in this! Our daughter loves it, too. She snuggles right up and is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great product for wearing your baby
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on wrapping and putting baby in could be better as well as tips for helping even out the weight of the baby on your back. However, the product itself is pretty good and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrap! Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: This Wrap has saved us so many times trying to balance a two year old and a 7 month old at the same time! It's easy to put on when you get the hang of it and is so secure! I would definitely recommend it to anyone with a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is great, the size is wide and long enough, my baby and I enjoy the walks around the neighborhood a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tendi

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Glad to support another momma!
customer_reviews.text: It only took a few tries to figure out how to use this. I love it and it's awesome especially when you have a colicky baby! The only thing I would change is the color and length. It's super long. I am 5'2 and 145 lbs but I just wrap it around me one more time. Good easily out weighs the bad!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little process to setting up but it does hold the baby securely.
customer_reviews.author: Kozak

customer_reviews.title: I actually returned my Ergo carrier because I liked the Haul'A more
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a baby carrier for a long time. I actually returned my Ergo carrier because I liked the Haul'A more! I love it for wearing my baby in and out of the house. I found the Haul'A and purchased because of your story. I like that it's a family business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I both enjoy wearing the baby and he is always happy in ...
customer_reviews.text: With 3 under 3, this is our sanity! My wife and I both enjoy wearing the baby and he is always happy in the wrap. The sling feature doesn't work for us, but that is a non-issue since it really was the wrap we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SissyMacKp

customer_reviews.title: Best baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: This wrap was better than I expected! It will fit any person, any size. Very easy to use and comfortable. Best baby carrier imo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bought several slings/carriers and this is by far the best! It is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several slings/carriers and this is by far the best! It is very comfortable. No shoulder discomfort from the straps. I have no problems carrying my 18# baby around. You can wear your baby for hours and have no pains or discomforts anywhere! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Broussard

customer_reviews.title: and not great if you have boobs
customer_reviews.text: had to return, puts all the weight on the small of your back, and not great if you have boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: I love this baby carrier and so do my twins
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby carrier and so do my twins! They are still small right now at 7 weeks at around 7 1/2 lbs each and thus works wonderfully foot carrying both of them. Just what I was looking for and very affordable! I would definitely recommend this carrier to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Howard

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations for a lower price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the price and excellent reviews it had. This is the first baby wrap I have ever used. At first i thought it would be hard to figure out but then I looked up videos on youtube and it was so simple to figure out. My son is only 2 weeks old and he seems to enjoy it. It keeps him calm and close to mom. I can't really compare it to other wraps since I've never used any but there is a huge price difference with the top brands and this one seems to do the trick just fine even though its a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Correna

customer_reviews.title: Love!! My first wrap and im in love
customer_reviews.text: Love!! My first wrap and im in love. So easy to use, lightweight, and comfortable! Wish I had this with my first 3 kids! It is very long as others stated but was easy enough to wrap up loose ends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. The fabric is breathable enough for summers in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. The fabric is breathable enough for summers in Louisiana and thick enough for winter. I love the diversity of this wrap/sling. It has more than enough fabric even for a not so thin mommy. I use it almost daily and my baby girl loves it. She often falls asleep while I do house work and stays content while I grocery shop.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Broussard

customer_reviews.title: But its duel purpose is going to be great! Serving as a belly band and a wrap ...
customer_reviews.text: Veryyyyy confusing at first! But its duel purpose is going to be great! Serving as a belly band and a wrap will be great for my aching back and amazing when my son arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Huegel

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The product in the picture is not the same wrap I received. The wrap was skinnier and thinner material. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wrap! It is my first wrap and was so easy to use. My 3 week old loves it, he's so cozy in there.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Beats all prices
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Beats all prices. Can do all the wraps I've been unable to do with my solly wrap. Ty for making an affordable wrap!
customer_reviews.author: joel heaton

customer_reviews.title: Not for a big baby, too hot
customer_reviews.text: My baby never liked this wrap. She got too hot and it had to be so tight or she would slip down too much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for your hipster friends expecting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Great for your hipster friends expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Bobweouta itzaboy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The material is strong and sturdy but still soft. It didn't stretch out or slip over the course of our shopping trip and I felt like the baby stayed very secure. Love it! For reference, I am using this with an 8lb infant.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Its very stretchy but once you make ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Its very stretchy but once you make adjustments to your liking it works well. I'm sure it's a learning curve and will get easier to use with time.
customer_reviews.author: baecel01

customer_reviews.title: I dont use mine like i dreamed
customer_reviews.text: I dont use mine like i dreamed. its stretchy, but too stretchy. i do not think any brand is better, just the style didn't really work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HAUL’A Baby Grey Baby Carrier | Ring Sling, Baby Wearing Wrap, Belly Binder & Maternity Belt |4-in-1
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey

Maggie Jorgensen is not only the mother of four beautiful and energetic children, but she is also the co-founder of Haul’A Baby and its new 4-in-1 nursing wrap and infant sling. After frustration using uncomfortable baby slings and wraps, she created an alternative for natural baby bonding. Inspired by her Latin American roots and her sunny Californian home, Maggie wanted to support busy moms in any weather. The stylish, versatile, wrap can be worn in multiple ways for the convenience of children and parents alike. Gentle enough for preemies, and durable enough for bigger toddlers, only the finest materials were used in the creation of this product. Help reduce back pain while you wear your baby, or provide prenatal or post-pregnancy soft abdominal support with our ergonomic comfort design. Our best comfortable baby carrier is a great item for baby boys and girls, and makes the perfect baby shower gift for new moms. Mom made and kid approved, Haul’A Baby’s Wrap is breathable, versatile, and designed to be used in all-weather.
feature_bullets: Haul'A Baby is the most breathable and lightweight carrier on the market, so you and your baby will be comfortable all day, in any kind of weather.

BREATHABLE CARRIER WRAP: Haul'A Baby’s baby sling, belly wrap and binder is the most lightweight device for babywearing on the market, so you and your newborn can cuddle up in any kind of weather. Our wrap for babies is perfect for experienced and expectant mothers alike.

ONE-SIZE-FITS-ALL: Our unisex swaddle wrap and baby holder is solid, combining soft cotton and stretchy spandex to adjust with your growing baby. Longer than most baby wraps, it’s great for plus size moms, men or other caregivers. It can carry up to 40 lbs per ring.

VERSATILE INFANT CARRIER: Our ergo baby wrap offers both forward facing and hip carry options for comfortable, easy wear, and ultimate baby protection. Meet your baby’s needs and save money while they grow, for a hands-free, active lifestyle. The wrap can be worn front or back, for girls or boys.

BOND WITH YOUR BABY: Baby wearing shirts encourage intense parent-child bonding, which is essential for the wellbeing and health of your infant. Perfect as a nursing cover while breastfeeding, or as a swaddle wrap, with this baby pack you can keep your newborn safe and comfortable all day.

GREAT VALUE PRODUCT: Our 4-in-1 convertible carrier works as a ring sling carrier, newborn wrap, postpartum belly binder, or maternity belt. With our 365 Day Money Back Satisfaction Guarantee we’re confident you’ll love our stylish baby wearing wraps.

specifications.Best uses: Baby carrier, Baby wrap, Pregnancy Support Wrap, Postpartum Belly wrap
